statements.select: select case when a.grossman is null then b.createname else a.grossman end as weightName, case when a.carcount is null then 0 else a.carcount end as grossNum, case when b.carcount is null then 0 else b.carcount end as tareNum , (case when a.carcount is null then 0 else a.carcount end )+(case when b.carcount is null then 0 else b.carcount end) as totalNum from (select t.c_grosswgtman as grossman , count(t.c_grosswgtman) as carcount from pm_bill_truck t where t.c_grosswgttime between #StartTime# and #EndTime# group by t.c_grosswgtman ) a full outer join (select u.c_createusername as createname ,count(u.c_createusername) as carcount from sm_tareweighthistory u where u.c_createtime between #StartTime# and #EndTime# group by u.c_createusername) b on a.grossman=b.createname order by totalNum desc

select case when a.grosswgtsitename is null then b.sitename else a.grosswgtsitename end as weightName, case when a.carcount is null then 0 else a.carcount end as grossNum, case when b.carcount is null then 0 else b.carcount end as tareNum, (case when a.carcount is null then 0 else a.carcount end )+(case when b.carcount is null then 0 else b.carcount end) as totalNum from (select t.c_grosswgtsitename as grosswgtsitename , count(t.c_grosswgtsitename) as carcount from pm_bill_truck t where t.c_grosswgttime between #StartTime# and #EndTime# group by t.c_grosswgtsitename ) a full outer join (select u.c_sitename as sitename ,count(u.c_sitename) as carcount from sm_tareweighthistory u where u.c_createtime between #StartTime# and #EndTime# group by u.c_sitename) b on a.grosswgtsitename=b.sitename order by totalNum desc
